Reference

Retrieving information from OSF

osf_auth()

Authenticate osfr with a personal access token

osf_retrieve_user() osf_retrieve_node() osf_retrieve_file()

Retrieve an entity from OSF

osf_ls_files()

List files and directories on OSF

osf_ls_nodes()

List projects or components on OSF

osf_download()

Download files and directories from OSF

Managing OSF projects and files

osf_create_project() osf_create_component()

Create a new project or component on OSF

osf_mkdir()

Create directories on OSF

osf_mv()

Move a file or directory

osf_rm()

Delete an entity from OSF

osf_upload()

Upload files to OSF

OSF Tibbles

osf_tbl

OSF Tibbles

as_id()

Extract OSF identifiers

Helper functions

osf_open()

Open on OSF

osf_refresh()

Refresh an OSF entity
